Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: Noticing that events share unique attributes like patient_age, patient_gender, and department, which can serve as identifiers for case groupings.

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Identifying that 'Register patient' marks the start of a case and 'Patient discharged' likely indicates the end of a case, allowing logical delimitation of cases.

Name: Validation - PE
Text: Validating groupings by comparing shared attributes (patient_age, patient_gender) and ensuring sequential events logically connect within each grouping.

Name: Inductive Reasoning - IND
Text: Generalizing that sequences like 'Register patient' → 'Doctor consultation' → 'Patient discharged' are standard components of a patient case.

Name: Backtracking - PE
Text: Revisiting previously identified cases to confirm consistent alignment of patient attributes across all grouped events.
